title: Learner-Centered Mathematics Education Design: Integrated Process of Personalization, Projects, and Self-Directed Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical theory and practical application experience
context.additional_context: Provides flexible learning environments utilizing digital devices alongside work-integrated project implementation for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% proficiency in applying mathematical concepts by designing individualized learning pathways.
Learners assess and improve their field problem-solving skills through team-based project implementation.
Learners analyze and adjust their learning outcomes at least twice monthly using self-directed learning strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
